name: The Expert
description:
You need to make sure papers are the correct color and shape before posting them on the board.

Distribute employees and avoid bankruptcy. But beware of burnout.

This project was developed as part of the Global Game Jam 2020.

Team: 
Design : Benoit Cohin
Art : Alexandre Brull
Programming : Cyril Toubeau, Tristan Jardon
Music : Mickael Blum, Michel Debois
